thread.title: Ukraine prepares for another year of war - Video - CityNews Calgary
thread.title_full: Ukraine prepares for another year of war - Video - CityNews Calgary

title: Ukraine prepares for another year of war - Video - CityNews Calgary
text: Calgary The latest updates and breaking news, now available around the clock. Check back in with us at any time to find out what's happening, and always be the first to know. CityNews, Everywhere. Police are sharing very few details about whether a large discovery of gold during a Montreal firearms raid has any connection to the gold that went missing earlier from Pearson Airport. David Zura explains. 12m ago It's been a year full of blockbuster movies like Barbie and Oppenheimer. Film Critic James Mackin ranks the top 10 of 2023. 2h ago The imminent dawning of a new year finds Ukraine still in the midst of war. Melissa Duggan with how the country is preparing for the next phase of battle. We all know about Barbie and Oppenheimer, but there are some other great movies that flew under the radar in 2023. Film Critic James Mackin helps build your holiday binge-watch list. 4h ago It’s been a year full of blockbuster movies like Barbie and Oppenheimer. Film Critic James Mackin ranks the top 10 of 2023. Nearly four years after the pandemic began, COVID-19 continues to circulate in Canada. Melissa Nakhavoly with how the virus could impact our lives in 2024. ‘You’re Beautiful’ singer James Blunt is back with a new book and album. CityNews’ Music Reporter speaks to the artist about his music path. A stabbing in the City’s Southeast left one person in life threatening condition. The victim was discovered near 17 Avenue and 40 Street S.E. around 9:30 on Friday night. CrossIron Mills Mall is offering free visits with Santa Claus at the Bass Pro Shops store. If you are wondering what’s open and what’s closed over the next few days, here’s a short list. The final section of Calgary’s ring road opened earlier this week. While motorists say it’s reducing commute times, some nearby businesses say they are not seeing the much-awaited boost. Henna Saeed reports. CityNews’ Sports Reporter Lindsay Dunn speaks with some of Canada’s top lacrosse players about the upcoming Women’s Senior National Box Championships and the sport returning to the Olympics. The American government started taking UFO sightings seriously in 2023. Richard Southern with what we learned, and what still remains unknown. 6h ago The Blue Jays have reportedly signed a fan favourite plus a mini Raptors reunion in Miami on Christmas Day. 7h ago
